job_tasks.phrase: Are you confident that AI is going to change our daily work as developers?
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on how AI impacts the work of developers, aligning with building AI-powered developer tools.

job_tasks.phrase: The Duo Workflow Group at Gitlab is creating the future of AI driven development
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the group's objective to build AI-driven development tools and platforms.

job_tasks.phrase: At this moment we're building an AI-Powered coding agent to speed up routine tasks, to improve your work, or to learn different approaches or technologies.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the creation of a coding agent, which is a software component that performs specific tasks for developers.

job_tasks.phrase: At the same time we're building the underlying platform to power AI driven workflows across GitLab.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the development of a platform to support AI workflows, which is a software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: As our new Backend Engineer, you'll build out our core service written that hosts and coordinates our AI agents.
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions building a core service to host and coordinate AI agents, a clear backend development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be involved in making sure the service follows up-to-date best practices for Python web development
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes adherence to best practices in Python web development, a core software engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: and orchestrating the communication between different services via gRPC
job_tasks.justification: Describes inter-service communication using gRPC, a common software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: as well as contributing to the core AI functionality.
job_tasks.justification: Implies involvement in the AI aspects of the product, which could include model interaction or fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Python engineer through and through you'll spread your knowledge across a company where the main language is Ruby.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the engineer's expertise and its application within a broader company context, touching on business alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Write high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code while adhering to best practices and contributing to code reviews
job_tasks.justification: Standard software development practices focused on code quality and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a highly scalable web platform based on Python and gRPC that can be deployed in different environments.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on building a scalable web platform using specific technologies, a core software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop interactions with the latest LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: Directly relates to working with and integrating Large Language Models, a key aspect of GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a testing infrastructure that allows us to verify agentic AI behaviours.
job_tasks.justification: Involves building infrastructure to test AI agent behaviors, which is part of the modeling and validation process.

job_tasks.phrase: Embrace continuous learning and stay connected with industry best practices, tools, and technologies around AI to drive improvements in our software.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly calls for continuous learning and staying updated with AI technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance
job_tasks.justification: Demonstrates a proactive approach to improving the product, which involves problem-solving and a focus on practical outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs ensuring scalability, performance, maintainability and measurability of our Duo Workflow platform.
job_tasks.justification: Involves collaboration on architectural and technical designs for a software platform, a key software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in Tier 2 or Tier 3 weekday, weekend, and/or occasional night on-call rotations
job_tasks.justification: Indicates responsibility for troubleshooting and maintaining production systems, which falls under operations.

job_tasks.phrase: We're hard at work creating a product and the infrastructure that changes development processes, building the tools of tomorrow.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on creating products and infrastructure that impact development processes, a software development endeavor.

job_tasks.phrase: We're partnering with teams both within the AI space as well as all over GitLab to ensure that Duo Workflow can become the backbone of many AI features at GitLab.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights collaboration to integrate the Duo Workflow platform as a core component for AI features, a software development integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: Embrace continuous learning and stay connected with industry best practices, tools, and technologies around AI to drive improvements in our software.
Advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance
Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs
We're partnering with teams both within the AI space as well as all over GitLab

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes building AI-powered coding agents and the underlying platform for AI-driven workflows. Key responsibilities include designing and developing interactions with LLMs and contributing to AI functionality, aligning directly with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile's focus on generative models and user-facing AI applications.
